mainText: I would not have thought that I'll be this sad and upset to the news of someone's death, someone that I didn't even know personally. But I'm truly in grievance over the news of Steve job death, once every now and then, someone comes along that is light years ahead of their time. Steve was one of them, pity the rest of us were not fortunate enough to continue benefiting from his vision and brilliance. RIP Steve.
author: Amir
